<script
  src="https://cdn.cookielaw.org/scripttemplates/otSDKStub.js"
  data-document-language="true"
  type="text/javascript"
  charset="UTF-8"
  data-domain-script="26faf404-90ff-4a85-b8bf-922986a02c35"
></script>
<script>
  window.OptanonWrapper = function () {
    const pageName = window._satellite.getVar("data; Page Name");

    const oneTrustRefresh = () => {
      const referrer = document.referrer;
      if (referrer) {
        _satellite.cookie.set("oneTrustRefresh", referrer, { expires: 0.004 });
      }
      window.location.reload();
    };

    const clickEvents = (event) => {
      // AMEND PREFERENCES button on Cookies Page
      if (
        event.target.classList.contains("cta-secondary") &&
        pageName === "po:en_gb:legalandprivacy:privacy:cookies"
      ) {
        event.preventDefault();
        OneTrust.ToggleInfoDisplay();
      }
    };

    OneTrust.OnConsentChanged(function (event) {
      oneTrustRefresh();
    });

    if (pageName === "po:en_gb:legalandprivacy:privacy:cookies") {      
      document.addEventListener("click", clickEvents);
      const template = `<style> #onetrust-banner-sdk {display: none;} </style>`;
      document.head.insertAdjacentHTML('beforeend', template);
    }
  };
</script>

const cleanValue = (t) => {
    try {
      return new DOMParser().parseFromString(t, "text/html ").documentElement.textContent.replace(/  s  s+/g, "  ");
    } catch (t) {}
  },
  getLinkText = (t) => {
    try {
      const e = t.getAttribute("data-linktext ") || t.getAttribute("data-link-text ") || t.getAttribute("data-linktext-temp ");
      return cleanValue(e);

list.title: Adobe Launch#gtag - Config [GA4]
list.description:
Actions

core/src/lib/actions/customCode.js html

<!-- Google tag (gtag.js) -->
<script async src="https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtag/js?id=G-0QKETQVGF7"></script>
<script>
  window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
  function gtag(){dataLayer.push(arguments);}
  gtag('js', new Date());
  gtag('set', { 'currency': 'GBP' });

  gtag('consent', 'default', {  
      // Deny consent for ad_storage   
      'ad_storage': 'denied',  
      // Deny consent for analytics_storage  
      'analytics_storage': 'denied',
      'wait_for_update': 1500
    })
  
  gtag('config', _satellite.getVar('data; GA4 Property ID'));
  
  //set GA
  if (_satellite.cookie.get("OptanonConsent").indexOf('C0002:1') > -1 ) {
    gtag('config', _satellite.getVar('data; GA4 Property ID'), {
      'send_page_view': false,
      'page_location':_satellite.getVar('data; GA - Add UTM'),
      'dimension2':_satellite.getVar('data; Market'),
      'dimension14':_satellite.getVar('data; Page Type'),
      'dimension15':_satellite.getVar('data; URL Param cid')    
    });
  }  
</script>
